author: cnbc.com
title: Bonterra Energy Corp. Confirms Cash Dividend for April 2018 Payable May 31st, 2018
text:
CALGARY, Alberta, May 01, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Bonterra Energy Corp. ( www.bonterraenergy.com ) (TSX:BNE) (“Bonterra” or the “Company”) announces that the April 2018 monthly cash dividend will be $0.10 per share and will be paid on May 31st, 2018. The record date for the dividend is May 15th, 2018 and the ex-dividend date is May 14th, 2018. The dividend is paid monthly and is subject to commodity prices and production levels.
The dividend is considered an "eligible dividend" for tax purposes.
Bonterra Energy Corp. is a conventional oil and gas corporation with operations in Alberta, Saskatchewan and British Columbia. The shares are listed on The Toronto Stock Exchange under the symbol "BNE".
For further information please contact:
George F. Fink, Chairman and CEO or
Robb D. Thompson, CFO and Secretary
